Name: Doge
Text: Yeah, it was hard but... Hey, wait a second, how did you get here? You're not that wacky!

Name: Caesar
Text: Good question. Anyway, Jim riled up some of the melkoge bulls nearby. I think he knows you're coming.

Name: Caesar
Text: Yeah, some bulls that escaped from the Cromch! factory when their monopoly collapsed. Remember, the hump is the weak spot!
